means: 包围，围困，围攻( besiege的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She was besieged by the press and the public.
sentence.Network_cn: 她被媒体和公众纠缠不休。

sentence.Network_en: The Afghan air force was using helicopters to supply the besieged town.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿富汗空军正用直升机向被围城镇提供补给。

sentence.Network_en: Paris was besieged for four months and forced to surrender.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴黎被围困了四个月后被迫投降。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 用美国小孩的方法学英语最有效：美国内战... ... besiege 包围，围困，围攻 besieged 被包围的 Vicksburg 维克斯堡.
beleaguered 被困besieged被困billet 营房；设营；职位；职务
The fans besieged the football player to get his autograph ., 球迷围住这位足球队员以索取亲笔签名.
The famous singer was besieged with hundreds of admirers ., 那位著名歌唱家被数以百计的敬慕者所包围.

list.abs: hundreds of admirers besieged the famous writer ., 数百名的崇拜者包围了这位著名作家.
主题: 《围城》钱钟书 (Fortress Besieged) Jeanne Kelly - PDF 返回组首页音乐综合讨论区资料综合讨论区影像医学不会游泳的鱼电 …
《围城》英译本（Fortress Besieged）先由珍妮·凯莉(Jeanne Kelly)译出初稿，再由茅国权校译润色，并于1979年由美国印地安娜大 …
But both were there watching as the police besieged a gang of Latvian anarchists ., 但是 , 他们当时都在观看警察围攻一群拉脱维亚的无政府主义者.
besiege 包围besieged cities 被攻占的城市biochemical suit /biohazard suit 防毒衣

entry.def: If you are besieged by people, many people want something from you and continually bother you.

example.ex: She was besieged by the press and the public.
example.tran: 她被媒体和公众纠缠不休。

entry.def: If soldiers besiege a place, they surround it and wait for the people in it to stop fighting or resisting.

example.ex: The main part of the army moved to Sevastopol to besiege the town...
example.tran: 军队主力转移到了塞瓦斯托波尔，对该城进行围攻。

example.ex: The Afghan air force was using helicopters to supply the besieged town.
example.tran: 阿富汗空军正用直升机向被围城镇提供补给。

auth_sentence.content: Investors in Hong Kong and Tokyo besieged brokerage firms.
auth_sentence.res_content: Investors in Hong Kong and Tokyo besieged brokerage firms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Investors in Hong Kong and Tokyo besieged brokerage firms.

auth_sentence.content: He was besieged with notes requesting private interviews.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was besieged with notes requesting private interviews.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was besieged with notes requesting private interviews.

auth_sentence.content: It was also besieged three times during the Civil War.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was also besieged three times during the Civil War.
